name: yjs-demos
description: You can ignore this package.json. We only need it for deploying the demos to our CDN.

scripts.dist:cm: cd codemirror && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist:cm6: cd codemirror.next && npm ci && npm run dist
scripts.dist:pm: cd prosemirror && npm ci && npm run dist
scripts.dist:pm-versions: cd prosemirror-versions && npm ci && npm run dist
scripts.dist:quill: cd quill && npm ci && npm run dist
scripts.dist:monaco: cd monaco && npm ci && npm run dist
scripts.dist:all: npm run dist:demo-server && npm run dist:cm && npm run dist:cm6 && npm run dist:pm && npm run dist:pm-versions && npm run dist:quill && npm run dist:monaco
scripts.container:stop: docker stop yjs-demos && docker remove yjs-demos
